languages.text: {n}Шайрэнкхей исполняет занятный жест, и один из эльдаров преподносит вам сверток.{/n} "Это мой первый и, скорее всего, последний дар подобным тебе, элантах. Пусть он послужит тебе верно, как служил детям Азуриана".

{n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it has served the Children of Asuryan."
languages.original_text: {n}Шайрэнкхей исполняет занятный жест, и один из эльдаров преподносит вам сверток.{/n} "Это мой первый и, скорее всего, последний дар подобным тебе, элантах. Пусть он послужит тебе верно, как служил детям Азуриана".

traits.locale_text: {n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably the last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it served the Children of Asuryan."

{n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably the last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it served the Children of Asuryan."

{n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it has served the Children of Asuryan."

languages.text: {n}Hace un gesto elaborado y uno de los Aeldari te entrega un paquete.{/n} «Este es el primer y probablemente el último regalo que hago a uno de los tuyos, elantach. Que te sirva fielmente como ha servido a los hijos de Asuryan».
languages.original_text: {n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it has served the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hace un gesto elaborado y uno de los Aeldari te entrega un paquete.{/n} «Este es el primer y probablemente el último regalo que hago a uno de los tuyos, elantach. Que te sirva fielmente como ha servido a los hijos de Asuryan».

languages.text: {n}他做了个复杂的手势，另一位艾达灵族走上前来，递给你一个包裹。{/n}“这还是我第一次给你的族群赠送礼物，也可能是最后一次。愿它像侍奉阿苏焉之子一样，忠实地侍奉你。”
languages.original_text: {n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it has served the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: {n}他做了个复杂的手势，另一位艾达灵族走上前来，递给你一个包裹。{/n}“这还是我第一次给你的族群赠送礼物，也可能是最后一次。愿它像侍奉阿苏焉之子一样，忠实地侍奉你。”

languages.text: {n}Il fait un geste complexe à l'un des Aeldaris, qui vous tend un paquet.{/n} « C'est la première fois que j'offre un cadeau à l'un des vôtres, elantach, et probablement la dernière. Qu'il vous serve fidèlement comme il a servi les enfants d'Asuryan. »
languages.original_text: {n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it has served the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il fait un geste complexe à l'un des Aeldaris, qui vous tend un paquet.{/n} « C'est la première fois que j'offre un cadeau à l'un des vôtres, elantach, et probablement la dernière. Qu'il vous serve fidèlement comme il a servi les enfants d'Asuryan. »

languages.text: {n}彼は複雑なジェスチャーをし、アエルダリの一人があなたに小包を手渡した。{/n}「これが最初で最後の贈り物だ。アシュリアンの御子らにささげたように、お前たちの役に立つことを願う」
languages.original_text: {n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it has served the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は複雑なジェスチャーをし、アエルダリの一人があなたに小包を手渡した。{/n}「これが最初で最後の贈り物だ。アシュリアンの御子らにささげたように、お前たちの役に立つことを願う」

languages.text: {n}Er führt eine komplizierte Geste aus, und einer der Aeldari überreicht dir ein Paket.{/n} "Das ist mein erstes und vermutlich letztes Geschenk an einen von Euch, Elantach. Möge es Euch so treu dienen, wie es den Kindern von Asuryan gedient hat."
languages.original_text: {n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it has served the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er führt eine komplizierte Geste aus, und einer der Aeldari überreicht dir ein Paket.{/n} "Das ist mein erstes und vermutlich letztes Geschenk an einen von Euch, Elantach. Möge es Euch so treu dienen, wie es den Kindern von Asuryan gedient hat."

languages.text: {n}Yaptığı gösterişli bir el hareketinin ardından Aeldarilerden biri, sana bir paket uzatıyor.{/n} "Elantach, muhtemelen bu sizlerden birine ilk ve son hediyemdir. Tıpkı Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na hizmet ettiği gibi sana da sadakatle hizmet etsin."
languages.original_text: {n}He makes an elaborate gesture, and one of the Aeldari hands you a parcel.{/n} "This is my first and probably last gift to one of you, elantach. May it serve you faithfully as it has served the Children of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaptığı gösterişli bir el hareketinin ardından Aeldarilerden biri, sana bir paket uzatıyor.{/n} "Elantach, muhtemelen bu sizlerden birine ilk ve son hediyemdir. Tıpkı Asuryan'ın Çocukları'na hizmet ettiği gibi sana da sadakatle hizmet etsin."
